Dialog.&6&l[pumpkinKnight]: Keep an eye out while wandering around, there is a shady figure in hiding.
He is a wanted man and should be brought to justice.
Would you mind helping me out and find him?
Awesome, if you find him please report him to the authories so they can arrest him.
Come back when you have some apples for me.
That's okay... We will find him with out your help...
Come back when you have some apples for me.
